procedures.procedure_description: This will make the drone fall out of the sky.

procedures.checklist_entry: Threatening wildlife: Get in car, RTH
procedures.procedure_description: Get in the car first, keeping the controller outside if possible. Then, RTH.

procedures.checklist_entry: Operational volume breached: Kill switch, call ATC
procedures.procedure_description: Activate kill switch and communicate with ATC (INSERT_ATC_CONTACT). Inform ATC of your situation, drone size, location, direction, height, speed, and remaining battery.

procedures.checklist_entry: Loss of control/fly-away: Try control, kill switch, call ATC
procedures.procedure_description: Try regaining control by lifting the controller overhead and orienting the antenna towards the UAS. If unsuccessful, activate kill switch and call ATC (INSERT_ATC_CONTACT). Share your situation, drone size, location, direction, height, speed, and remaining battery.
Call the radio room at INSERT_RADIO_ROOM_CONTACT.

procedures.checklist_entry: Crew unfit: RTH, first aid, call radio room
procedures.procedure_description: RTH and provide first aid. Call the radio room at INSERT_RADIO_ROOM_CONTACT. Keep calm and communicate clearly.
